message.content:
We start by extracting the key numbers from the three statements.

(1) Free Cash Flow (FCF)
• From the cash‐flow statement, FCF is typically computed as: 
  FCF = Net Cash Flow from Operating Activities – Capital Expenditures.
• Here:
  Operating CF = –10,442,735.47
  Capital Expenditures = Purchase of Fixed Assets = 2,479,994.53
So,
  FCF = –10,442,735.47 – 2,479,994.53 = –12,922,730.00

(2) Return on Assets (ROA)
• ROA is defined as Net Profit divided by average Total Assets.
• From the balance sheet:
  Beginning Total Assets = 28,000,000.00
  Ending Total Assets = 39,772,748.32
  Average Total Assets = (28,000,000.00 + 39,772,748.32) / 2 
                = 67,772,748.32 / 2
                = 33,886,374.16
• Net Profit from income statement = 3,744,117.89
Thus,
  ROA = 3,744,117.89 / 33,886,374.16 ≈ 0.1105 or 11.05%

(3) Return on Equity (ROE)
• ROE is calculated as Net Profit divided by average Owner’s Equity.
• From the balance sheet:
  Beginning Owner’s Equity = Paid-in Capital = 28,000,000.00
  Ending Owner’s Equity = 31,744,117.89
  Average Owner’s Equity = (28,000,000.00 + 31,744,117.89) / 2 
              = 59,744,117.89 / 2 
              ≈ 29,872,058.945
Thus,
  ROE = 3,744,117.89 / 29,872,058.945 ≈ 0.1254 or 12.54%

(4) Operating Cash Flow to Net Income Ratio 
• This ratio is defined as Operating CF divided by Net Profit.
• Here:
  Operating CF = –10,442,735.47
  Net Profit = 3,744,117.89
Thus,
  Ratio = –10,442,735.47 / 3,744,117.89 ≈ –2.79

(5) Net Profit Margin 
• Net Profit Margin is calculated as Net Profit divided by Total Revenue (from the income statement) multiplied by 100.
• Here:
  Net Profit = 3,744,117.89
  Total Revenue = 28,572,608.70
Thus,
  Margin = (3,744,117.89 / 28,572,608.70) × 100 ≈ 13.11%

(6) Gross Profit Margin 
• This margin is computed as Gross Profit divided by Total Revenue multiplied by 100.
• From the income statement:
  Gross Profit = 8,372,608.70
  Total Revenue = 28,572,608.70
Thus,
  Margin = (8,372,608.70 / 28,572,608.70) × 100 ≈ 29.31%

Now we present the solution in the required JSON format.

{
  "solution": {
    "Free Cash Flow (FCF)": "-12922730.00",
    "Return on Assets (ROA)": "11.05%",
    "Return on Equity (ROE)": "12.54%",
    "Operating Cash Flow to Net Income Ratio": "-2.79",
    "Net Profit Margin": "13.11%",
    "Gross Profit Margin": "29.31%"
  }
}
